summary: Changes the sunglare texture with a style similar to the sun on the Philippine flag
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/8/8c/Animated-Flag-Philippines.gif[/img]
[size=15]Isang pagpupugay sa watawat ng Pilipinas![/size]
[IMG]https://imageshack.us/scaled/large/707/philsun6.jpg[/IMG]

This is a texture replacer for your sunglare.
To Install, extract the archive contents to your Skyrim data folder.
Compatible with Vanilla Skyrim and Climates of Tamriel v3.1

Salamat!



[size=20]Check out also my other mods:[/size]
[center]
